page.title: 17Health _ The Health Centre
page.content:
Comber Health Centre is a small and pleasant building. There are 5 doctors, 3 nurses, 3 welfare workers, 1 dentist, 1 chiropodist, 5 receptionists and 1 speech therapist.
It serves roughly 6,000 people. Each worker has his own room or office. There is also a reception area and waiting room. Most people are happy with the clinic but some prefer the other Comber doctors because they can get appointments the same day and always see the same doctor. In the health centre, there is a 24_hour care system for illness and for social problems (like one_parent families), and preventative medical care.
I thought it was a very friendly place.
